post:
GalaxyHostPlus has started new 2016 Plans on their VPS Line.

GHP servers are located in Germany, Frankfurt and France Strasbourg.



PLAN: **OVZ - 2016 - L1**

    50 GB Disk Space
    512 MB RAM
    x1 CPU Cores Intel Xeon E5-1650v3
    500 GB Bandwidth
    1Gbps Network
    x1 IPv4
    IPv6: /80 IPv6
    SolusVM Control Panel
    Full Root Access
    Variety of choices of Linux OS
    OpenVZ Virtualization
    24/7 Free Premium support
    97.7% Network Uptime

Start's from **$2 /Month**

LINK:  [https://secure.galaxyhostplus.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=136](https://secure.galaxyhostplus.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=136)

Start's from **$6 /Month**

Link: [https://secure.galaxyhostplus.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=138](https://secure.galaxyhostplus.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=138)

**Billing based prorata billing of 1st of each month.**

***Note after 25th each month you will also be charged for next Month**

**FAQ**

Q: **Do we provide money back guarantee?**

A: Yes We offer you with a 3 days complete money back guarantee if service is not working.

Q: **Do we provide additional IPv4?**

A: Yes we provide additional IPv4 for $1.50 /Month

Q: **What Payment Methods We accept?**

A: We are accepting payments such as: Visa/MasterCard/Amex/Discover, PayPal, PayPal Express, 2CheckOut, Payza, Skrill, Stripe, Wire Transfer, BitCoins

Q: **Do you provide Test IP and Test File?**

A: Yes you can find about our network at [https://galaxyhostplus.com/network.php](https://galaxyhostplus.com/network.php) You can find Looking Glass on our Network page for both locations

Q:**Do we allow gameservers on yearly packages such as Minecraft?**

A: Yes we allow all GameServers hosted on VPS with fair share usage of CPU (We have automated system to detected abuse on nodes)

Q: **Are there any software we don't allow?**

A: You can find all information at  Terms Of Service: [https://galaxyhostplus.com/TermsOfService.php ](https://galaxyhostplus.com/TermsOfService.php )If something not listed it still don't says it's allowed if you are not sure please open sale ticket.

Q: **Do we allow mass mail?**

A: No we don't allow Mass Mail for more please check our SPAM Policy SPAM Policy: [https://galaxyhostplus.com/SpamPolicy.php](https://galaxyhostplus.com/SpamPolicy.php)

For any questions email us at [sales@galaxyhostplus.com](mailto:sales@galaxyhostplus.com)

Or simply comment below.
